text: Net nechestiveye i nespravedliveye togo, kto lozhno pripisyvayet Allakhu to, chto On ne zapovedal v Svoyom shariate. I net boleye nechestivogo, chem tot, kto otvergayet religiyu Allakha, - veru v istinu, - kogda yemu peredayotsya ob etom. V adskom ogne budet pristanishche dlya etikh nespravedlivykh nevernykh
